name: Of Bird and Cage
detailed_description:
Of Bird And Cage is an Action-Adventure Music Video Game! A first of a kind music album that is experienced entirely through a video game featuring artists from (ex) Guns N' Roses, Epica, Within Temptation, (ex) Evanescence and many others!

Based on 'The Beauty and the Beast', you play as Gitta, a beautiful young girl who tries to escape from the ever-changing prison of her capture - Bres. Will you be able to run away?

The game is a full-length Symphonic-Metal music album that is experiencing fully as an action-adventure video-game. Imagine a video-clip, where you're playing the main character, and you're able to interact with a world that is in perfect sync to the music and shape its story with your actions.

List all of the artists that are playing on the album:
  • Ron "Bumblefoot" Thal (ex-Guns N Roses)
  • Rob van der Loo (Epica)
  • Ruud Jolie (Within Temptation)
  • Casey Grillo (Kamelot)
  • Rocky Grey (ex-Evanescence)
  • John Lecompt (ex-Evanescence)
  • Mike Lepond (Symphony X)
  • Arjen Lucassen (Ayreon)
  • Tina Guo (Call of Duty: Black Ops II, X-Men: First Class, Journey, Inception)


We are currently in the midst of development. We plan on taking our vision to the next level, and we're hoping to make it as good as possible with the help of the Steam community!

short_description: Of Bird and Cage is an Action-Adventure Music Video Game! A first of a kind music album that is experienced entirely through a video game featuring world-renowned artists from (ex) Guns N' Roses, Epica, Within Temptation, (ex) Evanescence and many others!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

movies.name: Of Bird And Cage Teaser Trailer
Of Bird and Cage Live Music Show @ GameON 2018

content_descriptors.notes:
Have you ever thought how strange the plot of "The Beauty and the Beast" is? This poor girl is being kidnapped and becomes the prisoner of a terrible monster who is, at least in his own eyes, above all law. As time goes by, she warms up to the beast, and eventually falls in love with him. He then "magically" transforms into a " handsome prince charming". Well... that's what we call Stockholm Syndrome. 

"Of Bird and Cage" explores this theme and while the plot revolves around (a very twisted) love story it also features alcohol, drugs, hallucinations and (depending on the choice you make in the game) some potential of other very dark and bad scenarios. 

While all that is true, and there are also might be some sexual themes and violence in the plot, they are not explicit and there is no nudity in the game.
